org.hibernate.engine.transaction.jta.platform.internal

Class JBossStandAloneJtaPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.engine.transaction.jta.platform.internal.AbstractJtaPlatform
      • org.hibernate.engine.transaction.jta.platform.internal.JBossStandAloneJtaPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TransactionManagerAccess, JtaPlatform, Service, Configurable, ServiceRegistryAwareService

    public class JBossStandAloneJtaPlatform
extends AbstractJtaPlatform
    Return a standalone JTA transaction manager for JBoss Transactions Known to work for org.jboss.jbossts:jbossjta:4.9.0.GA
